UT Austin Color Contrast Grid

Test many foreground and background color combos for compliance with WCAG 2.0 minimum contrast.

To ensure our text content is easily readable (and to be in compliance with the University's Web Accessibility Policy), we must maintain a 4.5:1 contrast ratio between foreground and background colors(3:1 for text larger than 18 points).

Excellent tools for helping with color contrast issues:

  • Lea Verouâ€™s Contrast-Ratio.com
  • Tanaguru Contrast Finder
  • WebAIM Color Contrast Checker
  • Coolors Contrast Checker

Include one color per line, with an optional comma-separated label.

All colors taken from The University of Texas Design System Color Palette.

Use distinct rows & columns values Use the same rows & columns values

AA Pass, AA (4.5+)
AA18 Pass, Large Text Only (3+)
DNP Does Not Pass
